成隻腳到屎眼都勁多毛
廿歲頭鳩毛生上肚
最近發現啲毛向上生
到三十嗰陣應該有埋胸毛

千萬！不要！刮！ 你的肛毛！！！！

最近我犯下了人生中最大的一個錯誤！！！！

現在把經驗告訴大家，希望大家能從中吸取教訓！！！

這一切都要從我拉便便的問題開始說起！！！

不，你想錯了，實際上，我並沒有便秘！！！

只是在技術上的排便問題而已！！

我的肛毛太長太濃密了，每次拉便便總有一些沾在毛上面！！！

這些殘便粘的很牢，這讓我非常不爽！！！！！！

我必須用紙清理我的肛毛！！！

但這是個技術活！！！

因爲看不見我的屁屁，清理肛毛的時候經常會把屁屁其他地方弄髒！！

還有一個方法是用很多紙把整個屁股仔細擦一遍！！！！

這樣做的後果是紙用得太多我家馬桶經常會被廁紙堵住！！！！

這個問題困擾我很久！！！！！

經過深思熟慮以後，我想到了一個好點子！！！！

這是老子的屁股老子的肛毛！！！我的地盤我做主！！！！

爲什麽不把肛毛刮了呢????

這樣我的大便不就可以流暢排放了嗎！！！！

我腦子裏不禁浮現出金黃顔色的啤酒從酒桶裏潺潺流出的美麗景象！！！！！

但後來的事實證明，這是一個非常錯誤的想法！！！

那天晚上，我坐在毛巾上，開始用廉價的一次性剃刀刮我的肛毛！！！！

我要小心翼翼地把屁股分開，從oo到臀部，從內向外刮！！！！

時不時的我還要用毛巾清理刀片上的毛！！！！

還有沾在刀片上面的不明粘液！！

漸漸的，我的屁股和屁溝，就像小寶寶那樣光滑細嫩了！！！

終於完成了！！！我放下剃刀，開始檢查我的成果！！！！

哦耶！！！！我整個屁股現在就像象牙一般光滑！！！

感覺真是小！！清！！新！！！！

我的煩惱再也沒有了！！！

望著毛巾上剃下來的那堆毛，我欣慰而自豪地地笑了！！！

但我後來才知道，這個世界上的所有事物，都有它存在的原因！！！！！

失去以後才懂得珍惜！！！當刮掉肛毛以後！！！！我才感受到肛毛的寶貴！！！！

刮完肛毛的第二天,是一個陽光明媚的日子！！！

我高高興興地唱著歌兒去上學了！！！

爬了幾個樓梯以後我開始出汗！！！然後覺得有點不對勁！！！！

因爲沒有肛毛！！！屁股上的汗都留到菊花那裏去了！！！

我下面都濕透了..........

走路的時候我的兩瓣屁股因爲汗液而滑來滑去！！！！

本來我想去廁所弄幹，但是要上課來不及了！！！

只能等它自然晾乾！！！！

沒想到！！！屁股晾乾以後，菊花附近卻留下了一層大便一樣殘留物！！

把我的屁股都粘在一起了！！！

最坑爹的是！！！菊花開始癢了！！！

我艸！！就好象一萬隻螞蟻在屁股上爬來爬去！！！！

我很想把手伸到褲子裏去抓我的屁股！！！！好好爽一下！！！

但是旁邊人太多！！！我忍住了！！！！

就這樣我一路跑回了宿舍！！！

不幸的是，因爲是跑回來的，我又開始出汗了！！！

我的屁股又開始滑來滑去！！！

於是！！！我脫下褲子，拿出了電風扇！！！！

把屁股對準電風扇，準備吹乾！！！

但是！！！當我掰開我的兩瓣屁股以後！！！

從我的胯間！！！猛烈地散發出！！！！

一！！股！！！惡！！！臭！！！

味道散發得很快！！！

附近的狗，馬上開始汪汪狂叫了！！！

我自己最慘了！！！！

大便的惡臭一出來，就被電風扇吹到了我的臉上！！！

我都快吐了！！！

更沒想到的是，掰開沒一會，我的屁股開始流湯了！！！！

我掰著屁股吹著風扇，感受著自己大便味道的風吹拂在臉上！！

心裏湧起了一股淡淡的悲傷！！！！

馬X，看來老子要這樣過幾個星期了！！！

直到新的肛毛長出來爲止！！！我艸！！！！

沒過多久，我又發現了肛毛另一個重要的作用！！！

我想要放屁！！！但是放不出來！！！

沒有肛毛以後！！！**閉合得很緊！！！就好象真空包裝那樣！！！

就這樣屁放不出來，在我屁股裏竄來竄去！！！

像一隻迷了路的老鼠！！！


更糟糕的還在後面！！


過了幾天！！又粗又硬的肛毛茬長出來了！！！！

想象一下你菊花坐在釘板上的感覺吧！！！！

有時候，我望著窗外沈思，爲什麽我不跳下去呢！！！！！

摔成一個肉餅也比受這樣的折磨好得多啊！！！

所以說！！！！

我親愛的朋友們！！！！

千！萬！不！要！刮！肛！毛！啊！

replies.msg: 睇一次笑一次

I have recently made a mistake in my life, and I offer my story to you, that you may learn from my error. It all started, as many things do, with me having trouble shitting.

No, I was not constipated; this was not a regularity problem but a matter of technique. It seems my ass-hair had grown to such a length that tiny grogans were constantly getting tied up in the matted jungle between my asscheeks. It led to much frustration, with me KNOWING that I still had something to drop, but unable to shake the tenacious turd loose from its butthair dwelling. Eventually I would have to do two things: either reach down with some paper and try to pinch off the lingering loaf (which required careful precision to avoid smearing the creature all over my rear, especially since I had no way of seeing what I was doing) or just go for broke, start wiping, and hope that I could remove all the leftover fecal matter before the toilet paper reached its Can't-Be-Flushed threshold.

I was contemplating this problem, when I had what seemed at the time to be a bright idea. "Hey! This is my butt and my butt-hair, right? So why don't I just eliminate all the hair, and then my grogans will flow out like beer from a keg!" I said to myself. It is a statement that will go down in history with a lot of other regretted statements. "How many Indians could there be?" said by General Custer. "Looks like a good day for a drive!" by JFK. "There! America On-Line now has complete Usenet access!" by some idiot system tech. Such was my anal shaving idea.

I performed the operation that night, with a cheap disposable razor and a towel to sit on. Starting from the bottom, and shaving from the crack to the cheeks, I began the arduous process of ridding my ass of hair. Occassionally, I would have to clean the razor of accumulated hair and miscellaneous slime, which I did by wiping it on the towel. Slowly, my twin mounds and the between-ravine began to resemble the hairless cheeks of a newborn baby. Finally, I wiped the razor one last time, and surveyed my work. The towel was covered with a pile of hair. My ass was smooth as ivory. I smiled, satisfied, thinking my troubles were over.

quote.msg:
I have recently made a mistake in my life, and I offer my story to you, that you may learn from my error. It all started, as many things do, with me having trouble shitting.

No, I was not constipated; this was not a regularity problem but a matter of technique. It seems my ass-hair had grown to such a length that tiny grogans were constantly getting tied up in the matted jungle between my asscheeks. It led to much frustration, with me KNOWING that I still had something to drop, but unable to shake the tenacious turd loose from its butthair dwelling. Eventually I would have to do two things: either reach down with some paper and try to pinch off the lingering loaf (which required careful precision to avoid smearing the creature all over my rear, especially since I had no way of seeing what I was doing) or just go for broke, start wiping, and hope that I could remove all the leftover fecal matter before the toilet paper reached its Can't-Be-Flushed threshold.

I was contemplating this problem, when I had what seemed at the time to be a bright idea. "Hey! This is my butt and my butt-hair, right? So why don't I just eliminate all the hair, and then my grogans will flow out like beer from a keg!" I said to myself. It is a statement that will go down in history with a lot of other regretted statements. "How many Indians could there be?" said by General Custer. "Looks like a good day for a drive!" by JFK. "There! America On-Line now has complete Usenet access!" by some idiot system tech. Such was my anal shaving idea.

I performed the operation that night, with a cheap disposable razor and a towel to sit on. Starting from the bottom, and shaving from the crack to the cheeks, I began the arduous process of ridding my ass of hair. Occassionally, I would have to clean the razor of accumulated hair and miscellaneous slime, which I did by wiping it on the towel. Slowly, my twin mounds and the between-ravine began to resemble the hairless cheeks of a newborn baby. Finally, I wiped the razor one last time, and surveyed my work. The towel was covered with a pile of hair. My ass was smooth as ivory. I smiled, satisfied, thinking my troubles were over.

replies.msg:
Little did I know.

I now have a great respect for anal-hair. Like everything in this world God created, it has its mighty purpose in existence. It was only after I had removed it that I started to learn how much I had been taking it for granted. For one, it provides friction. I learned this the next day, when I walked out into the sun heading for class. After climbing two flights of stairs and starting to sweat, I started to notice something unpleasant. The sweat was accumulating in my crack, and was causing the unpleasant sensation of my two asscheeks sliding past each other with every step. I thought about going to the bathroom and wiping it off, but had to get to class. Eventually, I thought, it would dry.

Unfortunately, it did dry, but only after mingling with the microscopic shit- molecules lingering around my brown starfish. When I stood up after class, my cheeks were stuck together with a slimy sticky shit/sweat combination. As I made my way back to my dorm, it started to itch. God-DAMN, did it itch! Felt like a swarm of ants was making its way up and down my crack. Fighting to keep from jamming my hand down there and scratching away, I rushed back to the dorm.

Unfortunately again, this exertion caused me to sweat, and when I finally reached my room, my cheeks were sliding back and forth against each other like a pair of horny cane-toads. I quickly dropped my pants, and attempted to dry my ass off by sticking it in front of a fan and spreading my cheeks. As I pulled the two mounds of flesh apart, a horrible stench burst free and filled the room. Every dog within a 4 block radius started to howl. I had it worst of all, as the ripe aroma of festering shit/sweat went into the fan and blew back into my face. I fought to keep from heaving. And as I sat there, fighting vomit, my ass cheeks spread and dripping, with the concentrated aroma of my body odor mixed with the tangy smell of my own shit blowing right into my face, I had only one thought: "It will be like this until the hair grows back. Weeks."

replies.msg:
Later on, trying to deal as best I could, wiping my ass at every opportunity, I discovered another wonderful use for ass-hair - ventilation. I attempted to launch a fart, only to have it get stuck between my asscheeks. Apparently, with no hair, the two pink twins can get vacuum sealed together, and the result was a frustrating fart that slid up and down between my cheeks like a lost gerbil.

As if that wasn't enough, I am now enduring further torture. As anyone who has ever shaved anything knows, when hair is first growing in, it comes in as stubble. Imagine your ass having the texture of a brillo pad. Well, that is what I am dealing with now. It is a hellish torture, and there are many times when I just look out the window and contemplate why I shouldn't just jump out and get it all over with in one fleshy splat, rather than endure this constant agony.

Friends, DON'T SHAVE YOUR ASS-HAIR!

quote.msg: 肛毛嘅作用係同陰毛一樣

replies.msg:
講真雖然核突
又真係靚過鮑魚好多
反皮鮑連條女自己都覺得好撚嘔心

quote.msg:
千萬！不要！刮！ 你的肛毛！！！！

最近我犯下了人生中最大的一個錯誤！！！！

現在把經驗告訴大家，希望大家能從中吸取教訓！！！

這一切都要從我拉便便的問題開始說起！！！

不，你想錯了，實際上，我並沒有便秘！！！

只是在技術上的排便問題而已！！

我的肛毛太長太濃密了，每次拉便便總有一些沾在毛上面！！！

這些殘便粘的很牢，這讓我非常不爽！！！！！！

我必須用紙清理我的肛毛！！！

但這是個技術活！！！

因爲看不見我的屁屁，清理肛毛的時候經常會把屁屁其他地方弄髒！！

還有一個方法是用很多紙把整個屁股仔細擦一遍！！！！

這樣做的後果是紙用得太多我家馬桶經常會被廁紙堵住！！！！

這個問題困擾我很久！！！！！

經過深思熟慮以後，我想到了一個好點子！！！！

這是老子的屁股老子的肛毛！！！我的地盤我做主！！！！

爲什麽不把肛毛刮了呢????

這樣我的大便不就可以流暢排放了嗎！！！！

我腦子裏不禁浮現出金黃顔色的啤酒從酒桶裏潺潺流出的美麗景象！！！！！

但後來的事實證明，這是一個非常錯誤的想法！！！

那天晚上，我坐在毛巾上，開始用廉價的一次性剃刀刮我的肛毛！！！！

我要小心翼翼地把屁股分開，從oo到臀部，從內向外刮！！！！

時不時的我還要用毛巾清理刀片上的毛！！！！

還有沾在刀片上面的不明粘液！！

漸漸的，我的屁股和屁溝，就像小寶寶那樣光滑細嫩了！！！

終於完成了！！！我放下剃刀，開始檢查我的成果！！！！

哦耶！！！！我整個屁股現在就像象牙一般光滑！！！

感覺真是小！！清！！新！！！！

我的煩惱再也沒有了！！！

望著毛巾上剃下來的那堆毛，我欣慰而自豪地地笑了！！！

但我後來才知道，這個世界上的所有事物，都有它存在的原因！！！！！

失去以後才懂得珍惜！！！當刮掉肛毛以後！！！！我才感受到肛毛的寶貴！！！！

刮完肛毛的第二天,是一個陽光明媚的日子！！！

我高高興興地唱著歌兒去上學了！！！

爬了幾個樓梯以後我開始出汗！！！然後覺得有點不對勁！！！！

因爲沒有肛毛！！！屁股上的汗都留到菊花那裏去了！！！

我下面都濕透了..........

走路的時候我的兩瓣屁股因爲汗液而滑來滑去！！！！

本來我想去廁所弄幹，但是要上課來不及了！！！

只能等它自然晾乾！！！！

沒想到！！！屁股晾乾以後，菊花附近卻留下了一層大便一樣殘留物！！

把我的屁股都粘在一起了！！！

最坑爹的是！！！菊花開始癢了！！！

我艸！！就好象一萬隻螞蟻在屁股上爬來爬去！！！！

我很想把手伸到褲子裏去抓我的屁股！！！！好好爽一下！！！

但是旁邊人太多！！！我忍住了！！！！

就這樣我一路跑回了宿舍！！！

不幸的是，因爲是跑回來的，我又開始出汗了！！！

我的屁股又開始滑來滑去！！！

於是！！！我脫下褲子，拿出了電風扇！！！！

把屁股對準電風扇，準備吹乾！！！

但是！！！當我掰開我的兩瓣屁股以後！！！

從我的胯間！！！猛烈地散發出！！！！

一！！股！！！惡！！！臭！！！

味道散發得很快！！！

附近的狗，馬上開始汪汪狂叫了！！！

我自己最慘了！！！！

大便的惡臭一出來，就被電風扇吹到了我的臉上！！！

我都快吐了！！！

更沒想到的是，掰開沒一會，我的屁股開始流湯了！！！！

我掰著屁股吹著風扇，感受著自己大便味道的風吹拂在臉上！！

心裏湧起了一股淡淡的悲傷！！！！

馬X，看來老子要這樣過幾個星期了！！！

直到新的肛毛長出來爲止！！！我艸！！！！

沒過多久，我又發現了肛毛另一個重要的作用！！！

我想要放屁！！！但是放不出來！！！

沒有肛毛以後！！！**閉合得很緊！！！就好象真空包裝那樣！！！

就這樣屁放不出來，在我屁股裏竄來竄去！！！

像一隻迷了路的老鼠！！！


更糟糕的還在後面！！


過了幾天！！又粗又硬的肛毛茬長出來了！！！！

想象一下你菊花坐在釘板上的感覺吧！！！！

有時候，我望著窗外沈思，爲什麽我不跳下去呢！！！！！

摔成一個肉餅也比受這樣的折磨好得多啊！！！

所以說！！！！

我親愛的朋友們！！！！

千！萬！不！要！刮！肛！毛！啊！

如果樓主唔喺假膠，做laser啦，真喺一天都光晒
又乾手淨腳，部位細又唔會太貴

至於尷尬，人哋成日都幫人脫㗎啦
同睇醫生同樣道理，你睇醫生要俾佢睇會怕尷尬咩？

replies.msg: 呢啲相對敏感嘅地方，搵返Dermes / Medilase / Dr Reborn呢啲大centre都冇死
雖然脫咗肛毛，但喺屋企屙屎都會用花灑沖

quote.msg:

廿歲頭鳩毛生上肚
最近發現啲毛向上生
到三十嗰陣應該有埋胸毛
屌我都係 個情況一模一樣
